statements: SELECT * FROM literature_review_data
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM literature_review_data
SELECT id, title, author, publication_date, abstract FROM literature_review_data
SELECT * FROM literature_review_data WHERE publication_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT title, author, citation_count FROM literature_review_data ORDER BY citation_count DESC
SELECT * FROM literature_review_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM literature_review_data WHERE publication_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM literature_review_data WHERE author LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM literature_review_data WHERE keywords LIKE '%machine learning%' AND citation_count > 50 ORDER BY publication_date ASC;
SELECT id, title, author, publication_date, citation_count FROM literature_review_data WHERE abstract IS NOT NULL AND publication_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM LiteratureReview;
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM LiteratureReview WHERE id = 1;
SELECT author, publication_date, title FROM LiteratureReview WHERE publication_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT title, author, abstract FROM LiteratureReview WHERE author LIKE '%John%';
SELECT id, title, author FROM LiteratureReview ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM LiteratureReview ORDER BY publication_date DESC, title ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, title, author, publication_date FROM LiteratureReview WHERE author='John Doe'
SELECT id, title, author, publication_date FROM LiteratureReview WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY publication_date ASC
SELECT id, title, author, publication_date FROM LiteratureReview WHERE author='Jane Smith' AND publication_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01'
SELECT id, title, author, abstract FROM LiteratureReview INNER JOIN Reviewer ON LiteratureReview.id = Reviewer.reviewer_id AND Reviewer.specialization='Science'
SELECT * FROM literature_reviews;
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM literature_reviews ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT review_id, title, author FROM literature_reviews WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT review_id, title, author, publication_date FROM literature_reviews WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT review_id, title, author, content FROM literature_reviews WHERE author LIKE '%Doe%' ORDER BY review_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM literature_reviews;
SELECT review_id, title, author FROM literature_reviews WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT author, title, publication_date FROM literature_reviews ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT review_id, author, title, content FROM literature_reviews WHERE author LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY publication_date ASC;
SELECT r.rating_id, r.reviewer, l.title, r.rating FROM review_ratings r JOIN literature_reviews l ON r.review_id = l.review_id WHERE r.rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM Literature;
SELECT review_title, review_date FROM Literature WHERE review_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT review_id, review_title FROM Literature ORDER BY review_id DESC;
SELECT author_name, author_email FROM Authors WHERE author_affiliation = 'University';
SELECT journal_name, journal_publisher FROM Journals WHERE journal_publisher IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Literature ORDER BY review_date DESC, review_title ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT review_title, review_text FROM Literature WHERE review_date >= '2021-01-01' AND review_date <= '2021-12-31' ORDER BY review_date DESC;

SELECT author_name, author_affiliation FROM Authors LEFT JOIN Citations ON Authors.author_id = Citations.citing_review_id WHERE Citations.citation_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY author_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT journal_name, journal_publisher FROM Journals WHERE journal_publisher IS NOT NULL ORDER BY journal_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Literature JOIN Citations ON Literature.review_id = Citations.cited_review_id WHERE Citations.citation_date >= '2020-01-01' ORDER BY Literature.review_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM LiteratureReview;
SELECT title, author, publication_year FROM LiteratureReview WHERE publication_year > 2010;
SELECT title, abstract FROM Publications WHERE publication_year = 2021;
SELECT author_name, affiliation FROM Authors ORDER BY author_name ASC;
SELECT keyword_text FROM Keywords WHERE keyword_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM LiteratureReview ORDER BY publication_year DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT author, publication_year FROM Publications WHERE publication_year BETWEEN 2000 AND 2010 ORDER BY publication_year ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT lr.title, a.author_name FROM LiteratureReview lr JOIN Authors a ON lr.author = a.author_name ORDER BY lr.title ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT lr.title, COUNT(rk.keyword_id) AS keyword_count FROM LiteratureReview lr JOIN ReviewKeywords rk ON lr.review_id = rk.review_id GROUP BY lr.title ORDER BY keyword_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT a.author_name, p.title FROM Authors a JOIN Publications p ON a.author_id = p.author_id ORDER BY a.author_name DESC, p.title ASC LIMIT 5;
